ai_summary.Response: This commit updates several Microsoft Entra External ID documentation pages. It revises the date stamps across multiple files and refines the content related to security operations and planning. A significant change is the restructuring of the Conditional Access policy deployment guide, introducing a phased approach (Foundation, Core authentication, Advanced protection) with updated policy recommendations and license requirements.
